Name: SDN Archive at the History Room

About.Access: Access is strictly by prior arrangement with the Archive Manager.

About.Acquisition focus: The SDN Archive collects items, documents and ephemera relating to the history of SDN since its inception in 1905, and more broadly relating to the development of Children's Services in general.

About.Major holdings: Complete set of Annual Reports since 1905, minutes, oral histories, newspaper articles, photographs, ephemera.

Contact.Street address: SDN Woolloomooloo Child and Family Learning Centre

Contact.Postal address: Corner McElhone St and Reid Ave Woolloomooloo NSW 2011

Contact.Note: SDN Inc.(Sydney Day Nurseries) is a not-for-profit organisation dedicated to the care and education of young children (0-5), and has been in existence since 1905.
